thought: To craft a sea_lantern, I need to place 3 prismarine_shards and 5 prismarine_crystals on the crafting table. I have enough of both materials in my inventory, so I will start by moving a prismarine_shard from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
